surrounding_lines:
<div class="portlet-body">
                    <?php echo Form::open(['route' => 'actualizar.categoria', 'method' => 'POST']); ?>

                    <?php $__currentLoopData = $categorias; $__env->addLoop($__currentLoopData); foreach($__currentLoopData as $row): $__env->incrementLoopIndices(); $loop = $__env->getLastLoop(); ?>
                    <?php echo Field::text('nombre'); ?>

                    <?php echo Form::submit('ACTUALIZAR', $row->nombre, ['class' => 'btn btn-primary']); ?>

<div class="portlet-body">
                    <?php echo Form::open(['route' => 'actualizar.categoria', 'method' => 'POST']); ?>

                    <?php $__currentLoopData = $categorias; $__env->addLoop($__currentLoopData); foreach($__currentLoopData as $row): $__env->incrementLoopIndices(); $loop = $__env->getLastLoop(); ?>
                    <?php echo Field::text('nombre'); ?>

                    <?php echo Form::submit('ACTUALIZAR', $row->nombre, ['class' => 'btn btn-primary']); ?>

statements.sql: select * from `categoria` where `id` = '2' and `categoria`.`deleted_at` is null
hints: Use SELECT * only if you need all columns from table
